property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have indestructible.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As long as I stand, so will your cause."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash If a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some protection requires a bit of finesse.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your end step, choose a creature card in an opponent's graveyard, then that player chooses a creature card in your graveyard. You may return those cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May the memory of our fallen heroes ensnare the violent hearts of lesser men." - Great Threshold of Monserkat inscription

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Grasp of Fate enters the battlefield, for each opponent, exile up to one target nonland permanent that player controls until Grasp of Fate leaves the battlefield. (Those permanents return under their owners' control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance {5}{W}{W}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Kalemne's Captain becomes monstrous, exile all artifacts and enchantments.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Loyal Retainers: Return target legendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Create a 1/1 white Kor Soldier creature token. You may attach an Equipment you control to it. −2: You may put an Equipment card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield. −1[0]: Create a colorless Equipment artifact token named Stoneforged Blade. It has indestructible, "Equipped creature gets +5/+5 and has double strike," and equip {0}. Nahiri, the Lithomancer can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Oreskos Explorer enters the battlefield, search your library for up to X Plains cards, where X is the number of players who control more lands than you. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have not died until I consent."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. • Exile target enchantment. • You gain 5 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has indestructible. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may attach Shielded by Faith to that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has protection from creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shield of unimpeachable purity is as strong as any wrought on the anvil.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has vigilance, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I prefer loyalty to be a matter of respect, not of magic. But one does what one must." - Kaalia of the Vast

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I search for a vision of Zendikar that does not include the Eldrazi." - Expedition journal entry

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target spell. You may choose new targets for it. (If that spell becomes a permanent, it enters the battlefield under your control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see more than others do because I know where to look." - Saprazzan vizier

property.name: Rules
property.value: Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.) Whenever Broodbirth Viper deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Four parts molten bronze, yes ... one part frozen mercury, yes, yes ... but then what?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Deceiver Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one - • Untap target permanent you control. • Tap target permanent an opponent controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws two cards. Flashback - {1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. If an artifact or creature spell is countered this way, put that card onto the battlefield under your control instead of into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: First the insult, then the injury.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Gigantoplasm enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has "{X}: This creature has base power and toughness X/X."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I appreciate things that exceed expectations." - Mizzix

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Whenever Illusory Ambusher is dealt damage, draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Violence is the food it craves. Feed it if you dare." - Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only during the declare blockers step. For each creature attacking you or a planeswalker you control, create a token that's a copy of that creature and that's blocking that creature. Exile those tokens at end of combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. • Return target creature to its owner's hand. • Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The cost of your opposition will be extracted from your wits." - Nekusar, the Mindrazer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Friends teach what you want to know. Enemies teach what you *need* to know.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile all creatures you control. At the beginning of the next end step, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal that many creature cards, put all creature cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To Jin-Gitaxias, perfection is not a goal, but a process.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library. −1: Untap up to four target permanents. −1[0]: You get an emblem with "You may activate loyalty abilities of planeswalkers you control on any player's turn any time you could cast an instant." Teferi, Temporal Archmage can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As True-Name Nemesis enters the battlefield, choose a player. True-Name Nemesis has protection from the chosen player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has flying, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Soaring is wasted on the winged." - Edric, Spymaster of Trest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an Island, creatures you control have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The awestruck birds gazed at Wonder. Slowly, timidly, they rose into the air." - Scroll of Beginnings

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample You can't win the game and your opponents can't lose the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His slaves crave death more than they desire freedom. He denies them both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.) Whenever Banshee of the Dread Choir deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Corpse Augur dies, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of creature cards in target player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even when the flesh grows cold, knowledge waits in the bones for a master to release it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Constellation - Whenever Daxos's Torment or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, Daxos's Torment becomes a 5/5 Demon creature with flying and haste in addition to its other types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The terrors of the Underworld travel alongside those who return to the mortal realm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures. Each player loses life equal to the number of creatures they controlled that were destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the winds blow out of the abyss, death is the only harvest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way. Cycling {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Decree of Pain, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player mills X cards. For each creature card put into a graveyard this way, you create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Did you have a nice nap?" - Liliana Vess

card.name: Ob Nixilis of the Black Oath

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. −2: Create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying. You lose 2 life. −8: You get an emblem with "{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the sacrificed creature's power." Ob Nixilis of the Black Oath can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying You may cast Scourge of Nel Toth from your graveyard by paying {B}{B} and sacrificing two creatures rather than paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May all the cairns of Jund be toppled." - Meren of Clan Nel Toth

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As Thief of Blood enters the battlefield, remove all counters from all permanents. Thief of Blood enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each counter removed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her hunger will not be denied.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life. All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a difficult task to quarantine a plague that moves with the clouds." - Esara, healer adept

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Morbid - That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Linger on death's door and risk being invited in.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In matters of life and death, he trusts his gut.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has intimidate, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control. (A creature with intimidate can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Target player draws a card and loses 1 life. • Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste As long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For its time as a mortal, Anger chose a shell of boiling rock." - Scroll of Beginnings

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, sacrifice Awaken the Sky Tyrant. If you do, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards. −2: Sacrifice an artifact. If you do, return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield. −1[0]: You get an emblem with "Whenever an artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step." Daretti, Scrap Savant can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Destroy target creature of your choice, then destroy target creature of an opponent's choice. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Dream Pillager deals combat damage to a player, exile that many cards from the top of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its wings shimmer with dreams absorbed from its enemies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avacyn has abandoned us! We have nothing left except what we can take!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Fiery Confluence deals 1 damage to each creature. • Fiery Confluence deals 2 damage to each opponent. • Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For dim-witted, thick-skulled genetic mutants, they have pretty good aim." - Sisay, captain of the *Weatherlight*

property.name: Rules
property.value: Goblin Sharpshooter doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever a creature dies, untap Goblin Sharpshooter. {T}: Goblin Sharpshooter deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Wheel: Each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fate is not as fixed as you might think."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Meteor Blast deals 4 damage to each of X targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Behold astronomy's contribution to war." - Fennor Rhyl, starcaller

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target card that's an instant or sorcery from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, copy it, and you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. Exile Mizzix's Mastery. Overload {5}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Punishing Fire deals 2 damage to any target. Whenever an opponent gains life, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Punishing Fire from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures named Lightning Rager can't attack you or planeswalkers you control. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player creates a 5/1 red Elemental creature token named Lightning Rager. It has trample, haste, and "At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice this creature."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has first strike, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ruhan would never agree to such terms." - Ruhan of the Fomori

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create X 1/2 green Spider creature tokens with reach, where X is the number of creatures attacking you. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by non-Spider creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every movement is a summons - even your screams.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.) Each other creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Bloodspore Thrinax.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample As long as Brawn is in your graveyard and you control a Forest, creatures you control have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'I have arrived,' bellowed Brawn, and the plane shuddered." - Scroll of Beginnings

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Centaur Vinecrasher enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of land cards in all graveyards. Whenever a land card is put into a graveyard from anywhere, you may pay {G}{G}. If you do, return Centaur Vinecrasher from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each creature your opponents control, create a 4/4 green Phyrexian Beast creature token. Each of those tokens fights a different one of those creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who do not submit will be consumed."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Create a 1/1 green Elf Druid creature token with "{T}: Add {G}." −2: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. −6: Draw a card for each green creature you control. Freyalise, Llanowar's Fury can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Reach When Great Oak Guardian enters the battlefield, creatures target player controls get +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His roots reach deep and grip hard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words lie. People lie. The land tells the truth."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you control a Forest, rather than pay this spell's mana cost, you may have an opponent gain 3 life. Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give up these unnatural weapons, these scrolls. Heart and mind and fist are enough." - Zyd, Kamahlite druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Nest Invader enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It nurtures its masters' glorious future.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Pathbreaker Ibex attacks, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My skills are wasted here." - Juruk, Kalonian tracker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample. When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Slain warriors were buried with a tree sapling, so they would become a part of the forest after death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch When Skullwinder enters the battlefield, return target card from your graveyard to your hand, then choose an opponent. That player returns a card from their graveyard to their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two additional cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Titania, Protector of Argoth enters the battlefield, return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Whenever a land you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 5/3 green Elemental creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. • Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. • Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3, has trample, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Savagery is the birthright of every creature that draws breath - or wishes it could." - Karador, Ghost Chieftain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Wall of Blossoms enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each flower identical, every leaf and petal disturbingly exact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from white and from black Whenever you cast a creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Animar, Soul of Elements. Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each +1/+1 counter on Animar.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Anya, Merciless Angel gets +3/+3 for each opponent whose life total is less than half their starting life total. As long as an opponent's life total is less than half their starting life total, Anya has indestructible.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a spell, put the cards in your hand on the bottom of your library in any order, then draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He speaks directly into his supplicants' minds using fiery words that inflame their thoughts and incite their passions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who worship the great gargantuans could hardly be expected to fight with a subtle weapon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards. −2: Gain control of target artifact. −6: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more permanents, gain control of those permanents."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you get an experience counter. {1}{W}{B}: Create a white and black Spirit enchantment creature token. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of experience counters you have."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach Whenever an opponent casts a spell, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Swarms thrive in its nest, feeding on leathery bits of discarded wing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to one of your opponents, its controller may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am not at liberty to reveal my sources, but I can assure you, the price on your head is high."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you get an experience counter. At the beginning of combat on your turn, put X +1/+1 counters on another target creature you control, where X is the number of experience counters you have.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Firespout deals 3 damage to each creature without flying if {R} was spent to cast this spell and 3 damage to each creature with flying if {G} was spent to cast this spell. (Do both if {R}{G} was spent.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ghave, Guru of Spores enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment. • Destroy target artifact and target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Crovax knows we're coming now," said a grinning Sisay. "I just sent the *Predator* crashing into his stronghold."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Kaalia of the Vast attacks an opponent, you may put an Angel, Demon, or Dragon creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking that opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll have my revenge if I have to call on every force from above and below."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike, vigilance Whenever you cast a creature spell with mana value 5 or greater, you get an experience counter. Kalemne, Disciple of Iroas gets +1/+1 for each experience counter you have.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, put two +1/+1 counters on Karlov of the Ghost Council. {W}{B}, Remove six +1/+1 counters from Karlov of the Ghost Council: Exile target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Does Teysa think me blind to her scheming? Ambition runs in our family."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. If that creature is a Snake, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our revered ancestor Seshiro gave us wisdom greater than poison and fangs."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have haste. Cascade, cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order. Then do it again.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.) Other creatures you control have dethrone. Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a player sacrifices another permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The clicks and buzz of the undercity proclaim him the incarnation of decay.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature you control dies, you get an experience counter. At the beginning of your end step, choose target creature card in your graveyard. If that card's mana value is less than or equal to the number of experience counters you have, return it to the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As The Mimeoplasm enters the battlefield, you may exile two creature cards from graveyards. If you do, it enters the battlefield as a copy of one of those cards with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the power of the other card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The land drank power from the Mirari as though it had thirsted forever.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value greater than the number of experience counters you have, you get an experience counter. Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each experience counter you have.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Other creatures you control have intimidate. Whenever Vela the Night-Clad or another creature you control leaves the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vela snuffs out every trace of Krond's reign, leaving pure nightfall in her wake.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of permanents you own that your opponents control. {U}{R}{W}: Target opponent gains control of target permanent you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Basalt Monolith doesn't untap during your untap step. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. {3}: Untap Basalt Monolith.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has myriad. (Whenever it attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.) Equip {4}

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imprint - When Duplicant enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature. As long as a card exiled with Duplicant is a creature card, Duplicant has the power, toughness, and creature types of the last creature card exiled with Duplicant. It's still a Shapeshifter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip {0}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ideas drift like petals on the wind. I have only to lift my face to the breeze."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sandstone Oracle enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. If that player has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Exile any number of cards from your hand face down. Put that many cards from the top of your library into your hand. Then look at the exiled cards and put them on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token, then attach this to it.) Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half their life, rounded up. Equip {3}

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Seal of the Guildpact enters the battlefield, choose two colors. Each spell you cast costs {1} less to cast for each of the chosen colors it is.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd rather see the guilds contend together with words in the halls of power, than in the streets with swords." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Equip {1}

property.name: Rules
property.value: You have no maximum hand size. {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Infinite possibilities contained in a finite space.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza's metathran children were conceived, birthed, and nurtured by an integrated system of machines.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Worn Powerstone enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even a fragment of a powerstone contains within it not just energy, but space - vast dimensions trapped in fragile crystal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Arcane Sanctum enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must rely on our own knowledge, not on the dogma of the seekers or the mutterings of the sphinxes." - Tullus of Palandius

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield tapped. When Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield, exile target player's graveyard. {T}: Add {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Command Beacon: Put your commander into your hand from the command zone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I gazed once into that light. Now it burns in my mind, forever denying me rest." - Riku of Two Reflections

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When defeat is near and guidance is scarce, all eyes look in one direction.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Crumbling Necropolis enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They say the ruins of Sedraxis were once a shining capital in Vithia. Now it is a blight, a place to be avoided by the living." - Olcot, Rider of Joffik

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on Dreadship Reef. {1}, Remove X storage counters from Dreadship Reef: Add X mana in any combination of {U} and/or {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on Fungal Reaches. {1}, Remove X storage counters from Fungal Reaches: Add X mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Each player gains control of all creatures they own.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let your heels point you home." - Ancient blessing

property.name: Rules
property.value: Jungle Shrine enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Naya, ambition and treachery are scarce, hunted nearly to extinction by the awe owed to terrestrial gods.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Khalni Garden enters the battlefield tapped. When Khalni Garden enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token. {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Krosan Verge enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Krosan Verge: Search your library for a Forest card and a Plains card, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on Molten Slagheap. {1}, Remove X storage counters from Molten Slagheap: Add X mana in any combination of {B} and/or {R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on Saltcrusted Steppe. {1}, Remove X storage counters from Saltcrusted Steppe: Add X mana in any combination of {G} and/or {W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Savage Lands enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jund is a world as cruel as those who call it home. Their brutal struggles scar the land even as it carves them in its image, a vicious circle spiraling out of control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Seaside Citadel enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For wisdom's sake, it was built high to gaze on all things. For glory's sake, it was built high as a testament of power. For strength's sake, it was built high to repel all attacks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Activate only if you control five or more lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who bring nothing to the temple take nothing away.
